articles.title: Penguin Movie Review: A Thriller Merely Out to Turn Protagonist Into a Superwoman - News18
articles.description: Right from the start, 'Penguin' helmer Eashvar Karthic appears to have had just one single-minded motive – to turn his heroine, Keerthy Suresh, into a superwoman.
articles.content:
Penguin
Director: Eashvar Karthic
Cast: Keerthy Suresh, Linga, Madhampatty Rangaraja, Master Advaith
Tamil cinema is now bent on turning its lead actresses into super heroes. We saw this, to an ex… [+2720 chars]

articles.author: Quint Entertainment
articles.title: Anushka’s ‘Bulbbul’ Trailer is a Haunting Tale of a Child Bride - The Quint
articles.description: The trailer of Anushka Sharma’s first Netflix production Bulbbul is out and it offers a glimpse into the intriguing supernatural thriller. Starring Rahul Bose, Avinash Tiwary, Tripti Damri, the film drops on Netflix on 24 June.
